content.html:
The Command Dials

Before
You
Begin

The rear and front command dials are used for the operations
below.

1 Can be changed using 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL SETTING.
2 Applies if the lens has no aperture ring or if an aperture ring with an "A" position is in the A
position.


Front command dialRear command dial
�
Shooting 1AUTOChoose an auto/scene mode.Adjust exposure compensa- tion.
PChoose the desired combi- nation of shutter speed and aperture (program shift).
SChoose a shutter speed.
AAdjust aperture. 2
MAdjust aperture. 2Choose a shutter speed.
FILTERProgram shift.Adjust exposure compensa- tion.
MenusSelect menu tabs or page through menus.Highlight menu items.
Q MenuSelect items in the quick menu.Adjust settings in the quick menu.
PlaybackView other pictures.Zoom in or out (full-frame playback). Zoom in or out (multi-frame playback).
1

The rotation direction for the command dials can be selected using
BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL DIRECTION.

content.markdown:
# The Command Dials

Before
You
Begin

The rear and front command dials are used for the operations
below.

1

1 Can be changed using 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL SETTING.
2 Applies if the lens has no aperture ring or if an aperture ring with an "A" position is in the A
position.

|  |  | Front command dial | Rear command dial |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| � |  |  |  |
| Shooting 1 | AUTO | Choose an auto/scene mode. | Adjust exposure compensa- tion. |
| Shooting 1 | P | Choose the desired combi- nation of shutter speed and aperture (program shift). | Adjust exposure compensa- tion. |
| Shooting 1 | S | Choose a shutter speed. | Adjust exposure compensa- tion. |
| Shooting 1 | A | Adjust aperture. 2 | Adjust exposure compensa- tion. |
| Shooting 1 | M | Adjust aperture. 2 | Choose a shutter speed. |
| Shooting 1 | FILTER | Program shift. | Adjust exposure compensa- tion. |
| Menus | Menus | Select menu tabs or page through menus. | Highlight menu items. |
| Q Menu | Q Menu | Select items in the quick menu. | Adjust settings in the quick menu. |
| Playback | Playback | View other pictures. | Zoom in or out (full-frame playback). Zoom in or out (multi-frame playback). |


The rotation direction for the command dials can be selected using
BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL DIRECTION.

6

content.html:
The rear and front command dials are used for the operations
below.

The rear and front command dials are used for the operations
below.

1 Can be changed using 8 BUTTON/DIAL SETTING > COMMAND DIAL SETTING.
2 Applies if the lens has no aperture ring or if an aperture ring with an "A" position is in the A
position.
